content:
An invalid modifier was specified with an enumeration declared in an interface.

Error ID: BC31069

To correct this error

  • Remove modifiers such as Public, Private, Shared, Friend, Protected, Protected Friend, or Overridable.

See Also

Interfaces
Enum Statement
